quotes.quote: If we all tried to make other people's paths easy, our own feet would have a smooth even place to walk on.
Smooth and smiling faces everywhere, but ruin in their eyes.

Life has no smooth road for any of us; and in the bracing atmosphere of a high aim the very roughness stimulates the climber to steadier steps, till the legend, over steep ways to the stars, fulfills itself.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
The smoothest path is no guarantee against a broken neck.
The course of true anything never does run smooth.
There is no smooth road into the future: but we go round, or scramble over the obstacles.
The gates of Hell are open night and day; smooth the descent and easy is the way.
Show me a completely smooth operation and I'll show you someone who's covering mistakes. Real boats rock.
Is it not love that knows how to make smooth things rough and rough things smooth?
On the way out, the road is rough; returning, it is smooth.
Smooth words make smooth ways.
Why pamper life’s complexities when the leather runs smooth on the passenger seat?
If you think life is a smooth sea, you will soon be awakened from this sweet dream by the slap of a bitter wave!
The journey of high honor lies not in smooth ways.
Smooth your way to the head, through the heart. The way of reason is a good one; but it is commonly something longer, and perhaps not so sure.

Though the path is plain and smooth for men of good will, he who walks it will not travel far, and will do so only with difficulty, if he does not have good feet: that is, courage and a persevering spirit.
No one’s life is a smooth sail; we all come into stormy weather. But it’s this adversity – and more specifically our resilience – that makes us strong and successful.
Keep thy smooth words and juggling homilies for those who know thee not.
Smooth out with wine the worries of a wrinkled brow.
Smooth ice is paradise for those who dance with expertise.
Smooth shapes are very rare in the wild but extremely important in the ivory tower and the factory.
Smooth runs the water where the brook is deep.
Smoothly and lightly the golden seed by the furrow is covered.
For one man's chin is as rough as another's, and one man's lies are as smooth as another's.
Life is a short affair; We should try to make it smooth, and free from strife.
Always take hold of things by the smooth handle.
Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as ravens claws.
Love fattens on smooth words.
